name: friender
description: El proyecto Friender está pesando como una plataforma web que consiste en brindar opciones de empleo a sus usuarios, de forma dinámica, directa y seria, evitando protocolos e intermediarios.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.build-client: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --display-modules --config webpack/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.build-server: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production node -r babel-register node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/webpack.config.server.js
scripts.clean: rimraf dist/ & rimraf public/app & rimraf public/css
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development NODE_PORT=3000 && npm run start-pm2
scripts.start-analyzer: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development ANALYZER=true babel-node src/server
scripts.start-pm2: clear && npm run clean && pm2 start --interpreter babel-node ./src/server/index.js --name "friender" -u "friender"
scripts.start-pm2-production: clear && npm run build && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production NODE_PORT=80 pm2 start --interpreter babel-node ./src/server/index.js --name "friender" -u "friender"
scripts.start-production: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production NODE_PORT=80 babel-node src/server
scripts.start-deployment: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production DEPLOYMENT=true babel-node src/server

author: Michell Excellent
